{
  "companyName": "Chase",
  "problem": "Too time-consuming to verify ideas and compare in bulk to real world data.",
  "solution": "The Business Idea Validator:
A subreddit scraping, analyzing and answering system that allows validation of an idea and comparison to what people are already talking about on subreddits.",
  "scope": "1. Getting Started (Input)

Start with Google Sheets (keeping it simple!)
Put in a keyword and get 5 related keywords back
Tool starts looking for information

2. Finding Information

Collects comments from subreddits
Creates a new sheet with all the comments
Looks at how often problems come up
Groups similar problems together
Example: "kids not waking up" would be one group

3. Making Sense of Everything

Shows which problems were mentioned the most in the last 30 days
Example: "Problem A was mentioned 5 times"
Suggests 3 ways to solve each problem
Works like a smart helper (what we call an "agent")

4. Results
Simple Google Sheet or other interface to which our "AI Agent" connects (Slack, Telegram, Discord etc...)
Works like ChatGPT but for moms
Clean and easy to use (interface will be next step)",
  "currentDate": "2025",
  "howSoon": "42 days",

}
